Plot: Imaginative quiet teenager Rafe Katchadorian is tired of his middle school's obsession with the rules at the expense of any and all creativity. Desperate to shake things up, Rafe and his ...
Title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
Writer: Chris Bowman (screenplay), Hubbel Palmer (screenplay), Kara Holden (screenplay), James Patterson (based on the book by), Chris Tebbetts (based on the book by)
